question: Which of the following Satvahan King's name is inscribed on one of the gateways of Sanchi Stupa?
explanation: Gautamiputra Satakarni, also Gautamiputra Yajna Satakarni, was a ruler of the Satavahana Empire in present-day Deccan region of India. His name is inscribed on one of the gateways of Sanchi Stupa.
